meanings.sent1: She is an antifeminist who believes women should not have equal rights.
meanings.sent2: The antifeminist spoke out against gender equality in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The antifeminist joked that women should stay in the kitchen, which was not well-received.
meanings.sent4: His views on gender roles were so antifeminist that they sparked a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The antifeminist's beliefs were outdated and out of touch with modern society.

meanings.definition: Opposed to feminism or feminist principles.
meanings.sent1: Her antifeminist remarks offended many at the conference.
meanings.sent2: The antifeminist group protested against women's rights legislation.
meanings.sent3: His antifeminist attitude was met with disapproval by his peers.
meanings.sent4: The movie portrayed the villain as an antifeminist character, adding depth to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The antifeminist ideology clashed with the progressive values of the community.
